website_summaries.verdict: Short audio tower for small spaces and rooms. Just enough room for a basic audio setup.
pros: Large shelves provide plenty of space for large audio equipment
Overall size is good for tight rooms
cons: No room for larger speakers or taller equipment

customer_reviews.title: Bottom shelf shattered
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and when I got home last night I saw the bottom shelf holding the receiver shattered. Glass pieces were all over the area and took me awhile to clean it up. The Yamaha website has the receiver weighing 22 pounds so the shelf should have held it. Very disappointed and trying to contact the company to send me a replacement shelf. UPDATE: Fitueyes just sent me a replacement glass shelf. Happy they responded to my emails and now i can use the audio tower which looks great in my living room. Thanks Fitueyes!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Colombus

customer_reviews.title: Easier Than Ikea
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is easy. If you have built anything from Ikea, you can do this. Take a deep breath. As with any assembly, review the directions at least twice. Look at the pictures of the finished product. This unit is built upside down. Once assembly is completed, you will turn the unit right side up. That said, each glass shelf has a matte side, and the glossy side. During assembly, the matte side of the shelf should face up. When it comes time to tighten everything up (step 7), hand tighten each leg, then in a round robin fashion, continue to tighten each leg. Do not over tighten. Enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: Tom Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AV Rack
customer_reviews.text: For this price, this AV stand is the best. I'm able to modify the shelves to 2 racks instead of 3 by buying threaded rods from HomeDepot and cutting them as needed. The weight for bottom shelves is 33 lbs each and top one is 88 lbs. My power amplifier weighs 80 lbs and I wanted to put it on bottom shelf instead of a top shelf, so I combined two glass shelves into one. See the attached pic. If they can include the threaded rod for 2 shelves, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nen Chill

customer_reviews.title: Great compact a/v rack!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to hold Marantz SR7009, Panamax M5300, cable box, BluRay player, PS3, and Orbi WiFi router. I really love the size and minimalist look. Mine arrive timely and in great condition. It was easily assembled and is sturdy once together. It is the perfect size for my needs and even has some room to spare. If you are looking for a small unit to house your electronics, this should be at the top of your list. My only gripe is no cord management, but that is easy to take care of yourself.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is beyond good enough. It looks amazing when setup. I have a preamp and 2 monoblock amps so it can hold a good amount of weight but you really don't want to move it around once it's all loaded up. If you have to move it once it's all setup i highly suggest you remove some of your components first as this thing is mostly glass. The square columns are indeed metal albeit thin possibly aluminum, at first i thought it was plastic but this really is an all glass and metal console.
customer_reviews.author: nima bean

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rack!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! This is a very good Audio cabinet. I didn't have enough room on my TV stand for all of my stereo gadgets.to many amps and other goodies. Nice looking and perfect for my Audio components. Easy to assemble, as long you start out by following the instructions and make sure the threaded rod is more than hand tight. Take a pair of channel locks or something you can tighten it snug, but not over tight. After you do that, it pretty simple.the cabinet looks great and shows off my stuff. If your looking for a inexpensive Audio cabinet for you Audio, this works and looks very professional. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and solid
customer_reviews.text: I decided to set up a separate stereo system from my AV setup in my small living room.. I just had my Harmon Kardon HK2000 cassette deck gone over and had recently purchased the silver (Japanese version) Marantz CD5005 CD player. That led me to bring out of retirement my Marantz 2240 stereo receiver which I had bought new in 1975 when I had worked in a small independent stereo store.. The stand fit perfectly in my small living room and the top shelf was sturdy enough for me to place the 2240 with the wood cabinet on. With everything in place, the whole system is rock steady.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you can SHORTEN it, pretty easily!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking modern rack. I took out the middle section, so there's one tall level for receiver & shorter level for misc. Need to get an M8x1.25 threaded rod. For this setup, 2x 2-meter rods, each cut exactly in half, gives 4 perfect length rods to replace the long rods supplied. Grainger part # 25DM44 for $3.25. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Erol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AV Rack
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rack that is exactly what I was looking for. It went together easily and is extremely sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for. It was packaged with great care and arrived in perfect shape. Unfortunately, one of the bottom legs was missing, but one email to the seller and a new leg was shipped out. The seller actually answered my email that evening, so five stars for service, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sdbart

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly, decent material quality
customer_reviews.text: This media stand has decent material quality and was very easy to assemble (~20 mins with help from enthusiastic 7-yr old). It holds my turntable on top, CD player in the middle and heavier receiver at the bottom shelf. It would be great to have a version of this with one less shelf and the bottom or second shelf tall enough for storing records, but alas. In any case, I think it's worth the <$100 cost.
customer_reviews.author: vigil12

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet! Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This product meets all expectations, besides 1 key factor. The rods that hold the cabinet together are threaded on both ends. These threads are nearly too short near the end of the install. They need to be roughly 1/4" longer and it would be a 5-start product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a relatively heavy sound system because of the power. at first, I was hesitant to make this purchase because my receiver is pretty heavy. Have no worries! This shelf system is more than adequate to handle any home theater devices. Very easy to maintain and very easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: gesshooo

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my family room.
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a nice compact and smart-looking rack for my received, DVD player and game consoles. Easy to assemble. All of the shelves are glass and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: A peace of junk
customer_reviews.text: When received one of the rod holders was damaged and the plastic like base was cracked. Upon hand screwing the rod the base came loose and separated from the glass. I was very disappointed because I really needed the product. It appears to be glued with Pillsbury flour. I will be buying another product. Returned product today.
customer_reviews.author: victor e roman

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good AV stand. Exactly as I expected. So far it is holding on. Very easy to assemble. Glass seems very sturdy. So far I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Muk

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT STAND
customer_reviews.text: This stand is extremely attractive, compact and sturdy. Just the right height to put a TV on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Audio Stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Assembly only toke a half an hour. This unit is well made and looks awesome in my living room. I would buy another one if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Fits right in
customer_reviews.text: I needed an entertainment stand that would hold some new items I purchased. This is nicely styled and fits right in with my TV stand. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Carman

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I like everthing. A quality product thats look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: gary fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and attractive small component stand for my media room. Unobtrusive, elegant, and small enough that it doesn't get in the way of screen or speakers. Easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Glass Shelves
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred all of the shelves to be of the same thickness or be interchangeable. The top shelf is the thickest likely for the weight of a TV. I put my AVR on the bottom shelf and decided to reinforce the base by cutting 2 x 4's to fit perfectly under the AVR shelf. I then wrapped the base with black felt to hide the wood. All in all the unit works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Clean look
customer_reviews.text: I like it. There are some weird scratches on the glass that can't be explained, while it was packaged very well. I positioned those plates in a manner that I can not see them and it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Set Fire

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger and sturdier than anticipated. Looks great. Variable assembly options.
customer_reviews.author: John Cerveny

customer_reviews.title: This is great for an inexpensive way to stack components
customer_reviews.text: This is great for an inexpensive way to stack components. I was worried when the package got here. The box was torn in several spots. Not to worry the packaging kept the product from harm. This stand appears to be really flimsy at first look ....but once you get it all together and have the threaded rods fully tightened it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Rock 916

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: No instruction manual and no metal tube that was mentioned in the description; "make sure that the metal tube is properly secured". Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Looks great very expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nice looking piece just what I was looking for. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent media stand
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, solid, and good looking! Can't beat the price too. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy77

customer_reviews.title: Very good service,,impressive
customer_reviews.text: Since my order was damaged,,the seller has been very accomodated ,helpful and will replace my item as soon as they can,,again thank you,, look forward for this beautiful product,,J
customer_reviews.author: Jon Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stand and very sturdy. Assembly was simple and fast and it was packaged well. I only wish the legs were a bit thicker metal as they feel somewhat skimpy, though the unit itself is sturdy once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Teiresias

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Was missing an entire leg to the stand. Easier to return it and just buy someone else's cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M Goldstone

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and looks outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to assemble and looks outstanding. Perfect for 3 components and a turntable. The only thing I would add would be cable management.
customer_reviews.author: Hudge.tech

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Assembly in 15 mins. Sturdy as heck. Looks good too. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew g.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, threaded disc insert was broken from the upper glass shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Bangsong

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller. Product was as shown. Wonderful addition to our furnitures
customer_reviews.author: Sue Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Stand is very sturdy and a nice addition to my son's room. It's durable and easy to put together.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great, in fact, looks better than the price would indicate in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Ravanelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice AV component display
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in my man cave and looks substantial Nice design and easy to assemble. Perfect size and does not take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Giannattasio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice for the price. Very sturdy, and looks really sharp. Get buy.
customer_reviews.author: mjwjr

customer_reviews.title: looks very good in my man cave
customer_reviews.text: works great for me,holds all my stereo an video equipment,very strong,
customer_reviews.author: Robert Closson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Stable and sturdy, looks great. Literally only takes 15 minutes to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: s very nice, sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: it,s very nice, sturdy construction,.wish the black shaded or painted part of the shelves was cleaner lines,but very well packed.,
customer_reviews.author: RodR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and very sturdy. Simple style fits most decors.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, better than expected. Good quality and easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I was nervous at first since I've never heard of this brand but I'm glad I went with it.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, no fragile warnings on box
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it with all of the glass shattered to bits. In defense of ups, nothing on the box said fragile. Sending back asap. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Otero

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Looks great. Bought 2 units to set all of my Audio/Video equipment on it. Also, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: rishii

product_meta.title: FITUEYES 4-Tier Audio Video Cabinet with Tempered Glass AV Shelf Component Media Stand Entertainment Center for TV, Xbox, Gaming Consoles, Media Component, Streaming Device AS406002GB
feature_bullets: 【PRODUCT DESCRIPTION】The media stand size is 23.6(W)x17.9(D)x30(H) inches with component stand audio and video cabinet. The modular stand looks great, modern and streamlined, perfect for corners or remaining space.

【STURDY TEMPERED GLASS】 Each shelf is made of thickened reinforced glass and solid steel frame with powder coating to maximize strength and safety, it is sturdy structure, tighten the rods without wiggle. Weight capacity max 110/33/33/33 lbs for top shelf to the bottom.

【4-TIER ENTERTAINMENT SHELF】The black solid stereo stand includes the remaining storage space, which can accommodate audiovisual equipment, TV accessories, sound bar, woofer, DVD player, game console, Blu-ray player, PS4, Xbox One, cable box, amplifier , Speakers, record players, etc. The top shelf can also support certain LCD / LED flat panel TVs.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】Quick and easy assembly within 30 minutes, with step-by-step instructions.No tools are needed, just tighten everything by hand, and make sure that the metal tube is properly secured in the end cap before finally tightening the foot.

【PERFECT CUSTOMER SERVICE】 We have multiple warehouses in the United States, and we are able to delivery fast. We have wonderful customer service, if you have any problems, please contact us for free, we will response to you in 24 hours.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
